Description: ORIGINAL PERSOL 2365-S AVIATOR SUNGLASSES. Classic Persol Aviator Sunglasses in Black. Very Very Good Throughout. Currently Fitted with Strong Prescription Lenses. You can easily get these lenses replaced with either your own prescription or just sunglasses lenses. Third party replacement lenses are also easily available. Classic Vintage Style Aviator Frames Made in Italy. GunMetal Grey Frames with Metal Hinges and Carbon Fibre Styled Black Arms Signature Persol Detailing Throughout. Wearer's Right Inside Arm States: "Persol Made in Italy ". Wearer's Left Inside Arm States: "RB 2365-S 796/31 59 13 135 3N". This Model has a 59mm Frame, 13mm Bridge and approximately 135mm Arm Length. These Frames are Original, Authentic & in Very Good Condition Throughout. Supplied with a Contemporary Black Popper Fastening Case. Adjustable Hinges are Tight. Light Use Only. Some Very Light Marking to the Arms. Some Slight Fading to the Model Number on the inside Arm. ALL Questions Answered. Offers Considered. More High End Designer Sunglasses in My Other Listings. HUGE Photos at the Bottom of This Description. Thanks For Looking.
